alert.note: Alert for Clay; Lowndes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 3:52PM CDT until May 11 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Oktibbeha County in northeastern Mississippi... Eastern Winston County in east central Mississippi... Clay County in northeastern Mississippi... Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 352 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Slate Springs to near Ackerman to Stallo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Sturgis around 400 PM CDT. Craig Springs and Betheden around 405 PM CDT. Longview around 410 PM CDT. Starkville around 415 PM CDT. Mashulaville and Oktoc around 420 PM CDT. Sessums around 425 PM CDT. Artesia around 430 PM CDT. Macon, Brooksville and Tibbee around 435 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
